solution_line_template: On Tuesday, {books_taken_tuesday} books were taken, so there are {initial_books} - {books_taken_tuesday}= <<{initial_books}-{books_taken_tuesday}={books_after_tuesday}>>{books_after_tuesday} books left.

{books_brought_back_thursday} books were brought back on Thursday, so there are {books_after_tuesday} + {books_brought_back_thursday} = <<{books_after_tuesday}+{books_brought_back_thursday}={books_after_thursday}>>{books_after_thursday} books in the library.
Finally, {books_taken_friday} books are taken out on Friday, leaving {books_after_thursday} - {books_taken_friday} = <<{final_books}={final_books}>>{final_books} books available.
